mapper.select: SELECT A.BNKACCTKY, A.BNKPRODUCTKY, A.ACCTID, A.ACCTNAME, A.DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE, A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY, A.FIID, A.FIIDTYPE, A.FIIDTYPEENUM, A.DSPLYCDIRFIID, A.DSPLYPDIRFIID, A.ISSRCXFERENABLED, A.ISDESTXFERENABLED, A.MAXXFERAMT, A.MINXFERAMT, A.MAXPMTAMT, A.MINPMTAMT, A.VERSIONSTAMP as VERSIONSTAMP, A.UPDATEDTTM as UPDATEDTTM_FORACCOUNT, A.UPDATEUSER as UPDATEUSER_FORACCOUNT, A.BRANCHID,A.PRODUCTCODE, F.CUSTOMERID, F.BNKOrgKy, C.BNKCUSTACCTKY, C.CORCUSTOMERKY, C.NICKNAME, C.ISVISIBLE, C.ISCHARGETO , C.ISSLCTFORDOWNLOAD, C.STMTDOWNLOADDATE, C.TRNDATEFROM, C.VERSIONSTAMP, C.ISACCOUNTCLOSED, C.ISMANUALLYRELATED, C.CLOSEDACCOUNTDTTM, C.EXPRNTERMMONTHCNT, C.UPDATEUSER, E.BNKPRODSUBTYPEKY, E.BNKPRODTYPEKY, E.CORORGKYFI, E.NAME, E.DESCRIPTION, E.ACCTNUMDSPLYMASK, E.ISNONDSPLYREPLACE, E.MASKREPLACECHAR, E.ISPMTENABLEDNSC, E.DFLTTRNDTRANGE, E.DFLTFUTTRNDTRANGE, E.DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE as DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE_FORPRODUCT, E.ISSTMTASIMG, E.ISSTMTFROMLOCAL, E.ISREALTIMEACCTTRN, E.ISVIEWTRNIMG, E.TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH, E.ISACTIVATED, E.LISTORDER, E.ISREALTIMEACCTSUM, E.ACCTTYPE, E.ISREALTIMESTMT, E.ISTRNACTRPTAVAIL, E.ASSETLIABILITY, E.TRNHISTRETENTION, E.ISMEMOPOSTAVAIL, E.ISREALTIMEMEMOPT, E.ISPRODUCTINSURED, E.PRODUCTCODE, E.ISPRODUCTDELETED, E.DELETEREQUESTDTTM, E.CUTOFFTIME, E.CUTOFFDAYCNT, E.ACHCUTOFFTIME, E.ACHCUTOFFDAYCNT, E.UPDATEDTTM as UPDATEDTTM_FORPRODUCT, E.UPDATEUSER as UPDATEUSER_FORPRODUCT, E.VERSIONSTAMP as VERSIONSTAMP_FORPRODUCT FROM BNKACCT A, BNKCUSTACCT C, BNKPRODUCT E, BNKCustomer F WHERE A.BNKACCTKY = C.BNKACCTKY AND E.PRODUCTCODE = A.PRODUCTCODE AND F.BNKCustomerKy = C.CORCustomerKy AND E.CORORGKYFI = #{affiliateOid} AND C.CORCustomerKy = #{customerOid}

SELECT A.BNKACCTKY, A.BNKPRODUCTKY, A.ACCTID, A.ACCTNAME, A.DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE, A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY, A.FIID, A.FIIDTYPE, A.FIIDTYPEENUM, A.DSPLYCDIRFIID, A.DSPLYPDIRFIID, A.ISSRCXFERENABLED, A.ISDESTXFERENABLED, A.MAXXFERAMT, A.MINXFERAMT, A.MAXPMTAMT, A.MINPMTAMT, A.VERSIONSTAMP as VERSIONSTAMP, A.UPDATEDTTM as UPDATEDTTM_FORACCOUNT, A.UPDATEUSER as UPDATEUSER_FORACCOUNT, A.BRANCHID,A.PRODUCTCODE, F.CUSTOMERID, F.BNKOrgKy, C.BNKCUSTACCTKY, C.CORCUSTOMERKY, C.NICKNAME, C.ISVISIBLE, C.ISCHARGETO , C.ISSLCTFORDOWNLOAD, C.STMTDOWNLOADDATE, C.TRNDATEFROM, C.VERSIONSTAMP, C.ISACCOUNTCLOSED, C.ISMANUALLYRELATED, C.CLOSEDACCOUNTDTTM, C.EXPRNTERMMONTHCNT, C.UPDATEUSER, E.BNKPRODSUBTYPEKY, E.BNKPRODTYPEKY, E.CORORGKYFI, E.NAME, E.DESCRIPTION, E.ACCTNUMDSPLYMASK, E.ISNONDSPLYREPLACE, E.MASKREPLACECHAR, E.ISPMTENABLEDNSC, E.DFLTTRNDTRANGE, E.DFLTFUTTRNDTRANGE, E.DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE as DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE_FORPRODUCT, E.ISSTMTASIMG, E.ISSTMTFROMLOCAL, E.ISREALTIMEACCTTRN, E.ISVIEWTRNIMG, E.TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH, E.ISACTIVATED, E.LISTORDER, E.ISREALTIMEACCTSUM, E.ACCTTYPE, E.ISREALTIMESTMT, E.ISTRNACTRPTAVAIL, E.ASSETLIABILITY, E.TRNHISTRETENTION, E.ISMEMOPOSTAVAIL, E.ISREALTIMEMEMOPT, E.ISPRODUCTINSURED, E.PRODUCTCODE, E.ISPRODUCTDELETED, E.DELETEREQUESTDTTM, E.CUTOFFTIME, E.CUTOFFDAYCNT, E.ACHCUTOFFTIME, E.ACHCUTOFFDAYCNT, E.UPDATEDTTM as UPDATEDTTM_FORPRODUCT, E.UPDATEUSER as UPDATEUSER_FORPRODUCT, E.VERSIONSTAMP as VERSIONSTAMP_FORPRODUCT FROM BNKACCT A, BNKCUSTACCT C, BNKPRODUCT E, BNKCustomer F WHERE A.BNKACCTKY = C.BNKACCTKY AND E.PRODUCTCODE = A.PRODUCTCODE AND F.BNKCustomerKy = C.CORCustomerKy AND E.CORORGKYFI = #{affiliateOid} AND C.CORCustomerKy = #{customerOid} AND C.BNKACCTKY = #{accountOid}

update BNKCUSTACCT
BNKCUSTACCTKY = #{record.oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
CORCUSTOMERKY = #{record.customerOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
BNKACCTKY = #{record.accountOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
NICKNAME = #{record.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAYSEQUENCE = #{record.displaySequence,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

ISRESTRICTED = #{record.isRestricted,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
ISVISIBLE = #{record.isVisible,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
BNKRSTRCTRSNCDKY = #{record.bnkRstrTrsnCdKy,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
DEACTIVATIONDATE = #{record.deactivationDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ISSLCTFORDOWNLOAD = #{record.isSelectForDownload,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
STMTDOWNLOADDATE = #{record.stmtDownloadDate,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATEDTTM = #{record.updateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEUSER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSIONSTAMP = #{record.versionStamp,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
TRNDATEFROM = #{record.trnDateFrom,jdbcType=DATE},
TRNDATETO = #{record.trnDateTo,jdbcType=DATE},
ISCHARGETO = #{record.isChargeTo,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
ISACCOUNTCLOSED = #{record.isAccountClosed,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
ISMANUALLYRELATED = #{record.isManuallyRelated,jdbcType=SMALLINT,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
CLOSEDACCOUNTDTTM = #{record.closedAccountDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPRNTERMMONTHCNT = #{record.expirationTermMonthCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE = #{record.defaultHistoryTrnDateRange,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
